Key Match Events: Griffin Conine hit a two-out, two-run blast off the right-field foul pole
Taylor Rogers gave up a leadoff homer to Connor Norby
Otto Lopez scored on a pair of groundouts due to a controversial obstruction call
Pre-Game Insights: San Francisco Giants seem likely to shift into development mode in September
Mason Black was recalled from Triple-A Sacramento to fill in for the injured Robbie Ray
Black struggled to stick in his first look in the Giants’ rotation
The club's No. 8 prospect per MLB Pipeline
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Bob Melvin said Black did his job
Fitzgerald expressed disappointment with the obstruction call
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mason Black struck out a career-high six
Tyler Fitzgerald made an error on Jonah Bride’s routine grounder
Michael Conforto blasted a solo shot in the eighth inning
